CustomField.description: Calculates elapsed time between start and finish
CustomField.formula: IF( StartDateTime__c - FinishDateTime__c > 0 , TEXT( FLOOR( StartDateTime__c - FinishDateTime__c ) ) & " days " & TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (StartDateTime__c - FinishDateTime__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( ROUND( MOD( (StartDateTime__c - FinishDateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 ) ) & " minutes", "" )
CustomField.label: Duration
